short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension displays a users stats on FACEIT on their Steam profile.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Faceit stats by nol1cx is a browser extension that displays user stats from FACEIT.com on their Steam profile. Therefore it may be used as a shortcut to find more information quickly on the users FACEIT stats without having to go over to the platform.
